course.title: CSI 3104 Introduction to Formal Languages (3 units)
course.desc: Regular languages, finite automata, transition graphs Kleene's theorem. Finite automata with output. Context-free languages, derivation trees, normal form grammars, pumping lemma, pushdown automata, determinism. Decidability. Recursively enumerable languages, Turing machines, the halting problem.Course Component: LecturePrerequisite: CSI 2101 or MAT 2143.
